funding-group.funding-statement: This research was funded, in part, by grant RO1-AI55607 from the US National Institutes of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, ( https://www.niaid.nih.gov/, WKR), grant PBBEP3-128345 from the Swiss National Science Foundation ( http://www.snf.ch/en/Pages/default.aspx, GW) and grant PASMP3-137034 from the Swiss Foundation for Grants in Biology and Medicine ( www.snf.ch/en/Pages/default.aspx, GW). The funding agencies had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
